QuestData.Title: Unshackled Knowledge
QuestData.Description:
These Forsworn are looting the artifacts contained in Kalliope's Rest. What is worse is they have captured many of the shrine's scholars.
I fear they will interrogate these aspirants for knowledge about the artifacts held within the inner chamber of the shrine.
Most escaped with me, but Lano, Eratus, and Tyrana have not returned yet.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free Curator Lano, Librarian Eratus, and Historian Tyrana.
